description:
Enables local Autopilot Reset functionality on Windows 10 and higher. Remote Autopilot reset is supported only on newer versions of Windows 10, so this allows for resetting devices that haven't yet been updated. All newly connected corporate devices should be reset before use to remove any user or OEM installed software.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/windows-autopilot/windows-autopilot-reset-local
